hypothesis_content.title: Negative News Overshoot Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC experiences a sharp intraday drop (>5%) on negative macro news (rate hikes, regulatory fears), but funding rates remain neutral or slightly positive, price will reverse 50-70% of the drop within 48 hours as overreaction corrects.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Current market shows $600M liquidations on BTC drop to $85k, suggesting forced selling rather than fundamental shift. Funding rates not deeply negative indicates lack of sustained bearish positioning. Bank of Japan rate hike may be 'sell the rumor, buy the news' event.
entry_conditions: BTC 4h close down >5% from previous close
Negative macro news catalyst identified (rate hike announcement, regulatory headline)
Perpetual funding rate between -0.005% and +0.01% (not extreme negative)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price reaches 50% retracement of the initial drop
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price makes new low below initial drop low

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If price continues dropping >2% below initial low after 24 hours with funding turning negative >0.02%
